> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/469?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [89c6f11...e6e10d1](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/469?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).
I find these tools have so many false positives they just create busy-work that has no real impact. I'm afraid this PR just confirm that.

Hey @willmcgugan :wave: 

The false-positive rate of DeepSource is less than 5%.

I'd suggest you give it a try since [DeepSource](https://deepsource.io/) is free for Open Source.
